attr.title: Cave Buster
attr.desc: Play as a little alien guy who crash landed into the core of a dangerous planet.  Make your way through fiery caverns and alien fauna.  Find the super duper Burger and eat it!
attr.inst:
1.Extract the zip file in your ports folder.
2.Download 1 of the zip files from https://jontopielski.itch.io/cave-buster
3. Copy the "**.pck" file from your downloaded zip into the gamedata folder from the zip file you extracted earlier. Then rename it to "cavebuster.pck".
